_sText:
____________________________
de_dike v1.0 for CS:S
by MILLMAN & ***SANYA***
____________________________


IMPORTANT for admins: de_dike is BIG. So if you want people to be able to download this map correctly from ur server, you must use this command:


net_maxfilesize 27


de_dike map is 24 mb.//



====================
de_dike information:
====================



Map Name: de_dike 
Map Type: bomb/defuse
Realease date: June 11th, 2008
Bombsite Locations: 
 1 - inside the dam
 2 - in the building
Available Weapons: Standart 
Map Environment: part of the territory with the river and dam
Map Theme: my mind
Map's Time of the day: day
Special Features: 2 Elevators and a lot of doors.
Recommended/Maximum Players: 16/32
Custom Textures Used: yes
Custom Sounds used: yes
.NAV File Included: yes



============
INSTALLATION
============

Extract the rar's content into this folder:

"..../steam/steamapps/username/Counter-Strike Source/cstrike"



-----------------------------------------
Major known issues with de_dike v1.0:
-----------------------------------------
-The elevators are shaky
-Sounds can disappeard
-Some mountains are looking unreal))
-Can be problem with textures, they can become black.



===========================
MAP INFORMATION FOR GEEKS:
===========================

-This map took us 3 months to improve, from beta 1 to beta 2, and to this version 1.0

-Total build time in Hammer: 47 minutes

-This map has 3819 light sources!

-This map has 1 easter egg) 





Thanks for playing our map !
If you want to report a bug or give us some advice ?
Write to

  melnikov91@yandex.ru
or
  sernov@list.ru
